runs.comm: and like the Indian innings, Sri Lanka also start with a boundary, a wristy flick in front of square leg for four, it was a length ball on legstump to start from Nehra
looks to carve this one past point, it was back of a length and outside off, misses

big wicket for India here, the form batsman of the tournament Jayawardene  is gone, nicking a short of length ball outside off to first slip, nicely taken to his left by Yusuf at slip, batsman was looking to open the face and steer the ball there
just outside leg stump, struck on the pads, the ball rolls towards midwicket
short ball on offstump, Jayasuriya jumps and defends that one
shortish ball outside off, defended towards point, just five off the first over
starts with a back of length ball on off, defended towards cover
similar delivery, Dilshan makes room and swats it towards mid-off for a single
length ball angling across Jayasuriya, who gets on the front foot and defends it towards cover
shortish ball, powerful cross-batted hit towards midwicket
Sri Lanka have lost both their openers, Vinay Kumar is ecstatic, Jayasuriya short-arm pulls a shortish ball from outside off to midwicket, straight to Karthik, soft dismissal
keeps it short of length, outside off, defended towards backward point
not too short, but Dilshan decides to pull it anyway, makes good contact and gets it powerfully past square leg
outside off this time, Dilshan pokes it towards backward point
another boundary to square leg, bouncer from Nehra, Dilshan pulls it in the air just in front of square, lands a few yards inside the rope before rolling over
short of length on legstump, blocked back to the bowler
no slip in place, Dilshan takes advantage by opening the face and getting the ball past the keeper for four more
on the pads this time, defended towards midwicket for asingle
flighted delivery, pitching outside off, driven towards deep extra cover
gets forward to push towards cover, gets a bit of an edge towards short third
fourth boundary for Dilshan, down the track and lofted over mid-off for four, lovely hit from Dilshan
defended towards cover this time
boundary-count keeps rising for Dilshan, a poor delivery from Harbhajan, shortish and on legstump, swung away to long leg for four
full toss outside off, driven nicely past extra cover, doesn't go all the way to the rope, Sri Lanka get three though, 13 off the over
short of length ball in the channel outside off, Dilshan makes room to cut but he misses
misfield from Yuvraj at mid-off, full slower ball, driven to mid-off, the ball goes through his legs
slapped towards point by Sangakkara
back of length on offstump, Sangakkara gets forward and defends towards mid-off
shorter this time, on middle and leg, defended to the left of the bowler, who collects and throws down the stumps at the keeper's end
a typical extra cover drive from Sangakkara for four ends the over, still a decent one for India, only five off it
starts with one down the leg side, swept past short fine, not too well timed so deep square leg can come across
good diving effort from Yuvraj at short fine keeps the batsman down to one
fullish ball is turned towards midwicket for a single
shortish and on the pads, looks to turn it towards midwicket but misses and the ball rolls down the pitch
another dot ball, defended towards the off side
sliding down leg, looks to whip it toward square leg, misses and is struck on the pad
tossed up first ball, defended towards the leg side
fullish and outside off, looks to carve it through of but misses
whipped towards midwicket, can't beat the fielder there but get a single
overpitched outside off, driven off the front foot towards cover
width outside off, rocks back and looks to cut it, goes off the toe end, Gambhir dives at backward point but can't field, the ball trickles over the rope
on legstump, defended towards midwicket
sliding down leg, again Dilshan misses out as he tries to clip it towards square leg
cuts this one towards backward point for a single
on middle and off, Sangakkara tips it with soft hands towards square leg
another big wicket for India, Dilshan gets down on one knee and swings the ball straight to Yuvraj at deep backward square leg, Sri Lanka are 49 for 3
on middle stump, clips this one behind square leg
fires this one in, blocked back to the bowler
fullish ball, defended towards midwicket
'nice bowling PC,' shouts Dhoni after Piyush flights one outside off, defended
defended back to the bowler, three dot balls to start
leans across and taps the ball towards midwicket for a single
defended to the right of the bowler, Piyush dives to stop it
punched towards extra cover for a single to end the over
well outside off, chopped past short third
short of length on off, defended towards midwicket
gets his front leg outside off, glances the ball towards short fine
short of length and outside off, played off the back foot towards mid-on
length ball outside off, defended towards the off side
speared into offstump, turned towards short fine for  a single
looks for a big hit towards midwicket, Mathews gets a bit of a bottom-edge towards short fine
played off the backfoot towards extra cover for a single, Sri Lanka need a boundary here
they get it, gets down on one knee and swings it over deep midwicket for six
defended towards backward point, looks for the single but decides against it
driven off the front foot to the left of the diving Piyush Chawla
on legstump, clipped towards square leg
superb shot from Sangakkara, hardly seemed like there was any power behind that one, he comes down the track and flicks it over midwicket for six
full ball on off, Sangakkara lofts this one towards long-off for two more
turns this one from outside off towards backward square leg
on offstump, Mathews is happy to nudge it towards square leg
firmly driven to short cover off the backfoot
played towards mid-on for a single

lovely fielding from Dinesh Karthik at deep midwicket, that was a rank bad ball from Yuvraj, a half-tracker that sat up, Sangakkara slapped it wide of Karthik who sprinted across and dived to stop that one
full delivery, whipped away towards backward square leg where Nehra fields
low full toss, driven towards midwicket
low full toss, Sangakkara gets the front leg out of the way, bends his knee and swipes it towards midwicket, straight at the fielder, who could have got a run-out with a direct hit
another six for Sangakkara, again down on one knee after swiping it over deep midwicket
charging down the track and playing it down towards long-on
looks for a repeat of the shot that fetched him a six, gets it only as towards backward square leg this time
six more from Sangakkara, the game is changing here, down the track and lofts a length ball over wide long-on for his third six
gets a couple to midwicket to make it 16 off the over so far
gets a bit of a leading edge towards the bowler
Vinay's first ball is short, Mathews swivels and whack it over midwicket for a one-bounce four
length ball just outside off, defended towards cover
short ball outside off, helps it round the corner to square leg
Vinay gets the breakthrough, too late? Sangakkara is bowled for 46, its a slower ball, Sangakkara moves outside leg to cut it, misses and the ball hits the top of middle
Kapugedera gets off the mark by playing a short of length ball towards cover
another single, this time to square leg
full toss just outside off, driven along the ground to long-off
pitching just outside off and turning in, gets a bit of an outside edge towards backward point
full ball outside off, eased along the ground to long-on
turns the ball towards square leg
tipped towards short cover for a quick single
a wristy drive along the ground to long-on, only five off the over, are Sri Lanka eying only 144 or the win?
low full toss on legstump, clipped in front of square leg
short of length and outside off, wafts at it and misses
really poor delivery, on the leg side, swung past short fine leg for an easy boundary
a tough chance for Dhoni, Kapugedera was looking to dab it past the keeper but gets an edge, Dhoni dives full-length to his right and gets a glove on it but can't pouch it
another four, this is turning out to be good over for Sri Lanka, Mathews hops initially across the stumps, steadies himself and swats the short ball to deep midwicket for four
ends the over with a single to deep midwicket
Mathews puts India one step closer to the exit, down the track and lofts a full ball over wide long-on for four
jabs this one towards point for a single
opens the face and gets the ball towards deep backward point
pulls it short on seeing the batsman advance, Mathews can only block it back to the bowler
Mathews is again down the track, plays it stylishly towards extra cover
shot! manages to get the power off the backfoot,  leans back and swats it over extra cover for four
full and well outside off, Mathews dis it out towards cover
low full toss outside off, gets the front leg out of the way and carves it to deep point
low full toss on middle stump, swung towards deep midwicket
keeps it full, this time well outside off, batsman bends and slaps that towards cover
India are out, a full toss which isn't as low as the previous ones in this over, Kapugedera powers that towards long-on, the fielder though he had a chance but that one just about sails over the rope
and another, this time the fielder has no chance, muscled over long-on for a massive, Sri Lanka need 13 off the final over to win this one
beautiful hit from Mathews, a full toss from Nehra, on middle and leg, Mathews makes room and smashes it over long-off for six
makes room again, and gets it away towards third man, it was a shortish ball
superb running from Sri Lanka gets them two, Mathews swings it towards long-off, lands short of the fielder
full ball just outside off, squeezed towards sweeper cover by Kapugedera

Nehra runs out Mathews, Sri Lanka now need three from the final ball, a pinpoint yorker is dug out towards the right of Nehra, who runs forward and picks it up and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, no third umpire needed

Superb victory for Sri Lanka, Kapugedera charges down the track and carves that over sweeper cover for six to pull off a final-ball victory that puts them on the brink of the semi-finals. Kapugedera lets out a roar of delight and pumps the air
